title: 4th of July Typographically
content:
Hi there,

I'm just curious if anyone knows of anything (milestones, events, people, fonts, etc) that is typographically relevant or related to the 4th of July? Nothing serious. Just bored and curious.

Interested to see what people have to say,

Duncan
author: duncan

comments.content: Aside from the beautifully typeset Declaration of Independence? (not passed or signed on the fourth, I know, but at least it says, July 4, doesn't it?)
